name: Cubes Havoc Neon (Android)
description:
Cubes Havoc Neon Best android game.

Your goal is to form a shape, which can fit inside the moving wall. To form the shape, you have to tap on the cubes to destroy them. If you can't form the ideal shape in time, then you lose.

So if you want to win this game, then smash those cubes and make perfect shape!
: Game features:
• Two game modes: endless and stages
• One finger control.
• Various size walls
• Various shapes
• Different background color themes
• Simple and easy to play

you can get it on play-store for free enjoy
